block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This magnificent Origami Angelfish designed by John Montroll is simply stunning. It resembles greatly to an Angel fish and it is relatively simple to fold. Give it a try and see if you like it. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from John Montroll
block_list.body:
• Angelfish by John Montroll
  • Bull by John Montroll
  • North American Moose by John Montroll
  • Squirrel by John Montroll
